paymentProcessorResultCodeDescription.description: Transaction Denied, Permanent Denial, Not Likely to Succeed on Further Attempts

paymentProcessorTypeCodeDescription.description: Unknown. Could be pass or fail
Bad transaction data or setup, reenter
Card not permitted for this transaction type
Transaction type not permitted for this acct
Recurring Payment Failed and will continue to fail
Gift Card has not been activated
Check conversion: Auth OK, but check is not eligible for conversion
Retry the transaction, it is likely that a second attempt will work (e.g. sequence error)
For Interac you choose between checking and savings, this indicates the account selected is not set up
In some specific cases the issuer may need to indicate that a tap transaction that goes online must be inserted to complete
Unknown. Could be pass or fail
Either the username or password sent was invalid
User does not have permission for transaction type
Request requires obscure data but user does not have this restiction
Admin level transactions are not allowed to be run
User level transactions are not allowed to be run
Transaction type not supported for merchant
Invalid MICR data, or no MICR sent when required
TOReversal must be issued. Status of transaction received unknown
Maximum attempts to connect to processor reached
Transaction type not allowed in maintenance mode
License does not allow that card type
License Transaction Limit has been exceeded
Failure to write to the System database
This transaction has been authorized by the store and forward system
Auto-denied transaction due to fraud rule
